description: GridWorks Type Boolean Dispatch. Boolean dispatch command designed to be sent from an AtomicTNode to a SCADA.

AboutNodeName.title: About Node Name
AboutNodeName.description: The name of the Spaceheat Node that the dispatch request is for.

RelayState.title: Relay State (0 or 1)
RelayState.description: This is not applicable for double-throw relays that do anything other than open or close a circuit. A Relay State of `0` indicates the relay is OPEN (off). A Relay State of `1` indicates the relay is CLOSED (on). Note that `0` means the relay is open whether or not the relay is normally open or normally closed (For a normally open relay, the relay is ENERGIZED when it is in state `0` and DE-ENERGIZED when it is in state `1`.)

SendTimeUnixMs.title: Time the AtomicTNode sends the dispatch, by its clock
